name: Nafikov Timur
aboutText: Hi! ðŸ‘‹  Having gained over 10 years of experience in sales, I am confident in my ability to be highly adaptable, handle stressful situations effectively, and possess excellent communication skills. Everyday I try to improve my code skills and discover something new on the path of a web developer.
aboutText2: Yes, I am a bit older than ordinary applicants for this vacancy, and I perfectly understand possible doubts on your part, but I am ready to assure you that I have much more pros than cons:) here are a few of them:
listItem1: I am purposeful and know HOW to learn and find the answers I need.
listItem2: I know my strengths and weaknesses, which means I can soberly assess the possibilities and I think it's too late for me to be shy if I don't know something.
listItem3: I clearly understand the importance of compliance with regulations and deadlines, as well as the importance of compliance with agreements.
expResp: Creating attractive and well-functioning web interfaces in a short time based on customer instructions
